game.name: Fruit Slush Punch: Sara’s Cooking Class
game.description:
Sara is an expert chef and always busy in exploring ways on how to cook something unique delicious for the taste buds. Since she also loves in helping people learn different kinds of cooking recipes, you will get a chance here today to adopt new techniques and tricks on how to prepare fruit slush punch – an extremely delicious and refreshing drink. Get ready to try something that has really a mouth-watering taste. One of the best free online cooking game for girls, Fruit Slush Punch: Sara Cooking Class is enough to teach you how to get prepared an exciting and refreshing drink within the shortest possible time.

All you need to do is pay attention to Sara easy-to-follow and comprehensive instructions make your favorite drink in this cool cooking game for kids. Try to follow the instructions properly to earn the maximum possible points while preparing this amazing beverage. The good news is that Sara kitchen is equipped with all the latest and effective ingredients to help you out. Sara Cooking Class always comes with a lot to learn for the online gamers and especially those who are passionate about cooking. 

One of the best games to play, Fruit Slush Punch: Sara Cooking Class makes sure that you will try this recipe at your home in real once you play it in your browser. You are free to play this flash game alone or with your friends and enjoy the amazing recipes. Use all your best cooking skills and time-management skills to ensure the best outcomes in this popular challenging game for kids.
